feed.title: Ghost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.109.4
entry.content:
This release contains fixes for minor bugs and issues reported by Ghost users.

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.109.3...v5.109.4

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.109.5
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed invalid routes.yaml filter preventing Ghost from booting (#22174) - Michael Barrett

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.109.4...v5.109.5

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.109.6
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed invalid routes.yaml filter preventing Ghost from booting (#22174) - Michael Barrett
  • 🌐 Updated Catalan translations (#21826) - Àlex Rodríguez Bacardit
  • 🌐 Updated Catalan translations (#21829) - Àlex Rodríguez Bacardit
  • 🌐 Updated Bulgarian translations (#22097) - Yovko Lambrev

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.109.5...v5.109.6

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.110.0
entry.content:
• ✨ Added support for Node 22 - Daniel Lockyer
  • 🐛 Fixed missing attribution in new member and new subscription staff emails (#22252) - Steve Larson
  • 🐛 Fixed subscription attribution sometimes missing from SubscriptionCreatedEvent (#22219) - Steve Larson
  • 🌐 Updated Slovak translations (#21800) - Techkrypt-xyz
  • 🌐 Added missing Russian translations (#22186) - Paul

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.109.6...v5.110.0
